page.title: 11RECREATION THEATRE
page.content: The{Henderson Theatre}has become a centre for amateur and professional activities. It is small and the atmosphere is intimate. It is visited from time to time by organisations as august as the Scottish National Opera. Film shows are held there on occasion, as it possesses a projection room. The drawback is that for some events it is too small-its capacity being around 100 seats. Larger shows,such as the opera are held in Calderhead School Hall. The{Calderhead Community Centre in which the theatre is situated,is available also for sporting,social and educational activities.{The Old School {Community Centre}is also active.
